[Home](./index.md) &gt; [shieldbow](./shieldbow.md) &gt; [ClientConfig](./shieldbow.clientconfig.md)

## ClientConfig interface

The basic configuration for the shieldbow Client.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ClientConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache?](./shieldbow.clientconfig.cache.md) | { enable?: boolean; localRoot?: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The local caching settings. |
|  [fetch?](./shieldbow.clientconfig.fetch.md) | { champions?: boolean; items?: boolean; runes?: boolean; summonerSpells?: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The data to fetch beforehand when initializing the client. This can delay the initialization but makes the rest of the processes much faster. |
|  [locale?](./shieldbow.clientconfig.locale.md) | [Locales](./shieldbow.locales.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The locale in which to fetch all the data (defaults to region's default) |
|  [region?](./shieldbow.clientconfig.region.md) | [Region](./shieldbow.region.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The initial region to fetch all the data from (defaults to <code>na</code>) |
|  [version?](./shieldbow.clientconfig.version.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The data dragon CDN version (defaults to latest as per the specified region) |
